definition: to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Prevent degradation by keeping volumes of tourists within maximum acceptable limits.
sentences.chinese: 通过保持最大可能接受范围内的游客量而防止退化。

sentences.english: Our method Possesses global convergence under nondegenerate assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在非退化假设下，本文算法具有全局收敛性。

sentences.english: The relation between triangular forms of degenerate equations of any order is treated.
sentences.chinese: 分析了各阶退化方程的对角化形式之间的关系。

sentences.english: Ribbon lakes and bogs are present throughout the area, created by depressions left by receding glaciers.
sentences.chinese: 冰川退化后形成的丝带状的湖泊和沼泽遍布这一地区。

sentences.english: Natural resources are shrinking, degenerating and drying up.
sentences.chinese: 自然资源在萎缩，退化和枯竭。

sentences.english: It is also a major source of land and water degradation.
sentences.chinese: 它还是土地和水资源退化的一大根源。

sentences.english: The role of dopants and contaminants in degradation cannot be ignored .
sentences.chinese: 杂质和污染对退化的作用不能忽视。

sentences.english: Soil erosion is a major factor of causing environmental degradation.
sentences.chinese: 土壤侵蚀是造成环境退化的一个主要因素。

sentences.english: The art of printing secures us against the retrogradation of reason and information.
sentences.chinese: 印刷艺术防止我们的理性和知识退化。

sentences.english: Core protein and IRS1 degradation in a genotype- specific manner.
sentences.chinese: 核心蛋白在一个特定基因型的方式和IRS1退化。

sentences.english: The resample strategy is also used to cope with the impact of degeneration.
sentences.chinese: 利用重采样策略缓解退化现象对粒子滤波的影响。

sentences.english: Eutrophication is the main factor for the degradation of lake ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: 富营养化是导致湖泊生态系统退化的主要因素。

sentences.english: Sandstorms are becoming increasingly severe in northern China because of land degradation.
sentences.chinese: 由于土地退化，沙尘暴在中国北方变得愈加严重。

sentences.english: Elongated mostly scaleless marine fishes with large pectoral fins and reduced pelvic fins.
sentences.chinese: 多数细长的无鳞海水鱼，有大的胸和退化的。

sentences.english: The constitution of golgi apparatus degenerated gradually follow growth and development.
sentences.chinese: 高尔基体随着细胞的发育有退化趋势。

sentences.english: The proper binormal ROC model had been applied to the degenerate data.
sentences.chinese: 用真双正态模型处理了退化资料。

definition: to decline/to fall/to drop/to falter/a decline/recession (in economics)
(of insects) to undergo metamorphosis/(fig.) to be transformed/to metamorphose/to become degraded
to age/to deteriorate with age/old and weak
to wither/to dry up (of a plant)/to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
to age (of person or object)/becoming old
